review: Great ...  Did exactly what we wanted and it was easy to setup the first time.
author: Wm Cook

review: We dropped cable and use Netflix --easy and fast connection!
author: PROP GUY

review: Dont waste your money here. The thing doesnt work. Constant buffering. My old ancient roku works like a dream compared to fire. I wasted forty bucks since amazon doesnt like you return it. They send you tech support. Tech support cant fix a bad product.
author: Nilofar Amirizadeh

review: I liked it and figured out how tiger more apps to stream from my apple decides as well.
author: Jim

review: Love the Fire Stick. Easy to use.
author: Pat Gossage

review: This is worth the $20 I paid for it.  I bought this to replace the Plair (never worked) and It works fine.  The usb power has to be supplied via an outlet as my Samsung TV doesn't provide enough juice to power it.  Thats the only downside.  I brought this to the Caribbean hoping to use it however the geographic limitations prevented its use.  I would think its perfect for travel within the US but I havent tried that.  I would imagine the wireless access in hotels would prohibit its use.
author: TS New Canaan CT "Thomas Sill"

review: I didn't order this, not sure why I'm being asked to review it.
author: Bob King
